briefdescription.para: This function reads the Fota container firmware CRC on the fota header from the specified partition.

parameterdescription.para: mention the partition information from which firmware CRC info needs to be read. In-case of FOTA_PARTITION_DOWNLOAD specify the file name Incase of FOTA_PARTITION_PRIMARY file name is not used, can be NULL.
pointer to hold the Fota container firmware CRC information.

listitem.para: Storage_Setup & Storage_Enable must be called prior to using this API.

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK if fota container firmware CRC is read properly, or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: This function reads the Fota container firmware version on the fota header from the specified partition.

parameterdescription.para: mention the partition information from which Firmware version needs to be read. In-case of FOTA_PARTITION_DOWNLOAD specify the file name Incase of FOTA_PARTITION_PRIMARY file name is not used can be NULL.
pointer to hold the Fota container firmware version information.

listitem.para: Storage_Setup & Storage_Enable must be called prior to using this API.

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK if fota container firmware version is read properly, or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: This function reads the Fota container header from the specified partition.

parameterdescription.para: mention the partition information from which header info needs to be read. In-case of FOTA_PARTITION_DOWNLOAD specify the file name Incase of FOTA_PARTITION_PRIMARY file name is not used can be NULL.
Buffer pointer to hold the read Fota container header information.

listitem.para: Storage_Setup & Storage_Enable must be called prior to using this API.

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK if fota container header is read properly, or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: This function Triggers an firmware update from Sdcard.

listitem.para: Firmware has to be validated by calling FOTA_ValidateSdcardFw() before updating.
latest validated firmware will be updated.

simplesect.para: If firmware is valid.Device will be rebooted so no return value, or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: This function Validates the firmware in the Sdcard.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the firmware which needs to be validated.

listitem.para: Storage_Setup & Storage_Enable must be called prior to using this API.
If Firmware is valid,this API will rename the firmware to "firmware.bin"
In-case if "firmware.bin" is already available then it will be overwritten with the new firmware "firmwareName" .

simplesect.para: RETCODE_OK if firmware is valid, or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Verifies the Header CRC & firmware size of the given fota container.

parameterdescription.para: pointer to a buffer holding the fota container header data.
RETCODE_OK if header CRC is passed & firmware size is within the maximum range or an error code otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Verifies the firmware CRC of the given fota container partition.

parameterdescription.para: mention the partition information for which header firmware CRC needs to be verified. In-case of FOTA_PARTITION_DOWNLOADED specify the file name Incase of FOTA_PARTITION_PRIMARY file name is not used, can be NULL.
Operation buffer from the application where blocks of the firmware is kept for the CRC calculation.

listitem.para: Make sure minimum buffer size of optBuffer is sizeof(Fota_PartitionInfo_T).
Storage_Setup & Storage_Enable must be called prior to using this API.

briefdescription.para: This module will handle, FOTA related activities -Firmware validation in the SD Card -Firmware update from the SD Card.
